title: Bukit Panjang LRT service disruption due to power fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 由于电力故障，Bukit Panjang LRT服务中断
title_translations.ms: Disruption perkhidmatan Bukit Panjang LRT disebabkan oleh arus elektrik
title_translations.ta: சக்தி குறைபாட்டை காரணமாக, புக்கிட் பஞ்சாங்க்கு எலெக்ட்ரிக் மின்சாரத்திற்கான சேவையில் தடையேற்பாடு

updates.text: 11.30am: BPLRT - Train service is progressively returning to normal. Free regular buses and bridging buses are still available at the designated bus stops outside the stations.
11.20am: BPLRT - Due to a power fault, train service is not available at all stations. Free regular buses and bridging buses are available at the designated bus stops outside the stations.
9.50am: BPLRT - Due to a power fault, train service is not available at all stations. Free regular buses or bridging buses are available at the designated bus stops outside the stations.
There are free regular bus services and bridging bus services available for affected commuters, said SMRT.
9.20am: BPLRT - Due to a power fault, train service is not available at all stations. Free regular buses or bridging buses are available at the designated bus stops at the stations.
